title: Raising fish in an ocean pen

content.description: A scientist is evaluating a proposal for raising large numbers of fish in ocean pens for human consumption. As part of the evaluation, the scientist is designing a plan for investigating how the fish in the ocean pens might affect nearby ecosystems.
content.question: Which of the following is the most appropriate factor to use as the dependent variable in the experimental investigation?

choices.label: The amount of metabolic wastes in the water where the fish are being raised
The water temperature in the natural habitat of the fish being studied
The types of fish that are preferentially consumed by humans
The amount of time it takes for fish to digest a meal

content.answer: The amount of metabolic wastes in the water where the fish are being raised

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
